site_meta_desc: An example page showing you how to use Xolv.io's md-blog.
md_blog_desc: A drop-in markdown blog for your Meteor app.
feature1_desc: Write your blog posts in the popular markdown syntax on the left, and see your changes live on the right.
feature2_desc: You can create, publish, unpublish, archive, unarchive and delete blog posts.
feature3_desc: Uses %s which contains lots of themes to choose from to suit the look and feel of your site.
feature4_desc: This demo site uses the %s responsive framework, but you can use anything you like from Bootstrap to Foundation.
love_open_source: We __heart__ the open-source community and welcome feedback and contributions.
